intro: Thesium macranthum, commonly known as the large-flowered thesium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Xanthorrhoeaceae, which includes plants known for their showy inflorescences. Thesium macranthum is often found in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky outcrops.
